article_title: Israel launches new military operation in central Gaza
sentence: The  Israeli  military  says  it  has  taken  “operational  control”  over  eastern  areas  of  Bureij  refugee  camp  and  the  town  of  Deir  al-Balah  in  central  Gaza,  as  dozens  of  Palestinians  were  reported  killed.

article_title: Israel launches new military operation in central Gaza
sentence: Residents  reported  intense  bombardment  and  the  charity  Médecins  Sans  Frontières  said  at  least  70  dead  people  -  the  majority  women  and  children  -  had  been  brought  to  a  local  hospital  since  Tuesday.

article_title: Israel launches new military operation in central Gaza
sentence: Israel  launched  a  military  campaign  in  Gaza  to  destroy  Hamas  in  response  to  the  group's  cross-border  attack  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  during  which  around  1,200  people  were  killed  and  251  others  were  taken  hostage.

article_title: Israel launches new military operation in central Gaza
sentence: At  least  36,580  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  then,  according  to  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: Israel launches new military operation in central Gaza
sentence: On  Wednesday  morning,  Palestinian  news  agency  Wafa  cited  medics  and  rescue  workers  as  saying  at  least  11  people  were  killed  in  Israeli  air  strikes  on  several  homes  in  Maghazi  overnight.

article_title: Israel launches new military operation in central Gaza
sentence: Another  two  people  were  killed  in  a  strike  on  a  home  near  the  entrance  to  Bureij,  while  two  more  were  killed  by  artillery  fire  in  the  Abu  al-Ajen  area,  south-east  of  Deir  al-Balah,  it  said.

article_title: Israel launches new military operation in central Gaza
sentence: The  charity  said  women  and  children  made  up  the  majority  of  the  70  dead  people  and  300  wounded,  brought  to  hospital  over  the  past  24  hours,  and  that  many  patients  were  suffering  from  severe  burns,  shrapnel  wounds,  fractures  and  other  traumatic  injuries.
